feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Admin unlocking user, also verify workflow steps by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20613
  • chore: Update CONTRIBUTING.md by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20641
  • feat: auto turn on overlay calendar while loggedin by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20610
  • feat: Removed offset start times feature from UI by @avnish100 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20634
  • feat: display year for bookings in different years by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20647
  • chore: remove unnecessary tests and mock data by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20648
  • fix: flaky ooo e2e test by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20649

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.19...v5.1.20

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add organization routing forms endpoints [v2] by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20580
  • fix: updatedAt routing form response migration by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20660
  • fix: convert SVG avatar into PNG on save and serve by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20654
  • fix: Broken API docs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20664
  • fix: ensure only top tip has focusable elements by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20661
  • chore: Add logging and try/catch blocks in handleCancelBooking by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20665
  • revert: "fix: Broken API docs (#20664)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20667
  • fix: App installation option at the team level by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20666
  • perf: make useLocale hook to use server-fetched i18n if in App router context by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20597
  • fix: location input value in custom event name by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20619
  • fix: replace hard-coded strings with translation keys for internationalization by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20672
  • feat: Org and Team ID on organisation and team pages by @krakenftw in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20645
  • fix: Make event type title visible in mobile view by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20670
  • fix: dynamic text variable not populating on workflows by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20657
  • fix(analytics): Add cookie_flags to GA4 config for embedded contexts by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20627
  • feat(event-types): phase out offset start times feature for new event types [CAL-5450] by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20623
  • chore: clean up api v2 docs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20668
  • fix: make settings sidebar accordion items keyboard accessible by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20663
  • feat: conditionally show contact us or report issue based on plan by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20629
  • feat: allow paid users to see report issue option by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20687
  • fix: add react fragment to layout.tsx by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20693

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.20...v5.1.21

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Revert "fix: Make event type title visible in mobile view ( by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20695
  • chore: Make app compatible with Fluid Compute by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19841
  • fix: recalculate date range from filter segments by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20633
  • fix: uneven toggle ui on availability page by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20701
  • fix: made text dependent on host's refund policy by conditionally rendering text. by @romitg2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20572

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.21...v5.2.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: required booking fields message by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20688
  • feat: dry run behaviour for CalendarSettings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20690
  • feat: dry run behaviour for event type atoms by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20689
  • feat: dry run behaviour for AvailabilitySettings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20686
  • feat: dry run behaviour for connect atoms by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20699
  • feat: Redirect to original event link for rescheduling cancelled booking by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18605
  • fix: Improves dialog window that appears when there is no availability in a month. Adding a description to clarify limits when rolling or range period types are in use. by @shawnCaza in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20451
  • feat: email workflow templates translation by @giripatel in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20674
  • fix: make padding equal on availability toggle by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20708
  • feat: placeholder component for user dropdown to remove layout shift by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20696
  • fix: Tasker import and error handling for routing form responses by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20713
  • fix: availability CTA height by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20714
  • fix: don't allow seats for recurring events by @PAVANNAIK25 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19257
  • fix: routing form endpoints date filters validation [v2] by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20715
  • feat: v2 return slots based on routing form response by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20637
  • feat: organization booking hooks by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20611
  • fix: readonly ics error by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20651
  • feat: Embed - Show skeleton loader when pageType is provided by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20646
  • perf: Fetch data server-side for Webhook Create page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20675
  • refactor: improve error handling in captureErrorsMiddleware by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20718
  • feat: lindy.ai app by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20721
  • feat: v2 get slots using teamSlug + eventTypeSlug + optional organizationSlug by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20554
  • fix: wrong translation value by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20727
  • chore: Rename @calcom/lib/date-fns to @calcom/lib/dayjs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19870
  • perf: remove user booking routes from middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20726
  • fix: EventTypeSettings atom default schedule title by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20725
  • test: e2e test for the Routing Form to Event Booking flow by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20728
  • feat: Whitelist user's from workflow spam scanning by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20717

New Contributors

  • @shawnCaza made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20451
  • @giripatel made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20674

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.0...v5.2.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: disable Google Translate from HTML by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20738
  • fix: buggy skeleton rendering for month view by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20744
  • fix: Wrong schedule ID set for child managed event by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20745
  • feat: v2 book team events using teamSlug & eventTypeSlug by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20585
  • fix: failing e2e test by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20751
  • feat: filter users by assigned attribute options [v2] by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20659
  • fix: Admin/owner unable to confirm managed bookings by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20743
  • refactor: v2 automatic round robin reassign error message by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20755
  • fix: return react fragment from all layout.tsx by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20737
  • feat: add guards to stripe teams controller by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20540

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.1...v5.2.2
